item.title: Discovering Karappara: A Hidden Forest Route Near Nelliampathy
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Explore Karappara, a hidden monsoon trail near Nelliampathy. Discover scenic forest roads, rivers, and rare natural beauty in this offbeat Kerala route.

item.title: Elephant Tusk Smuggling Foiled Near Valparai: Five Arrested Including Forest Staff
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: 5 arrested, including forest staff, in Tamil Nadu's shocking elephant tusk smuggling case. Watch the viral poaching video & learn how insider threats endanger India's wildlife. A wake-up call for conservation.

item.title: Tourists Chased by Elephant on Valparai–Athirappilly Road
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Shocking video: Tourists narrowly escape charging elephant on Valparai-Athirappilly road! Why forest officials warn against two-wheelers in this dangerous wildlife corridor. Stay safe—know the rules.

item.title: Pollachi to High Forest – The Ultimate Valparai Western Ghats Travel Guide
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Discover High Forest—Tamil Nadu's secret hill station near Valparai! Tea estates, 40 hairpin bends & misty trails. Complete guide with bus timings, road conditions & monsoon photography tips.

item.title: Ooty - Kinnakorai Travel Guide 2025
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Discover Kinnakorai—Tamil Nadu's misty hidden gem near Ooty! Tea estates, secret waterfalls & perpetual fog create magic. Complete 2025 guide with road tips, photo spots & sustainable travel hacks.

item.title: Kollengode Travel Guide: Top Things to Do in Palakkad’s Instagram-Famous Village
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Kollengode, Kerala's secret monsoon paradise! Discover emerald paddy fields, roaring waterfalls & film locations from Odiyan. Complete travel guide with best photo spots, local eats & itineraries.

item.title: Gavi Kerala KSRTC Forest-Bus Timings, Entry-Pass Booking, Wildlife Safari, Budget Forest Stays
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Discover Gavi's rainforest magic on Kerala's iconic KSRTC bus (₹153 ticket!). Complete guide to permits, monsoon wildlife, KFDC forest stays & photography tips for this hidden Periyar gem.
